entry.title: 4 in. White Gimbal LED Recessed Downlight, 2700K
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nicor
Type: LED Recessed Retrofit Kits
Price: 26.99

 4 in. White Gimbal LED Recessed Downlight, 2700K

Features
  • 2700K Color Temperature
  • 534 Lumens
  • 9.5-Watts
  • 113° Beam Angle
  • Adjustable 35° tilt with 360° rotation

ATTRIBUTES
Model Number
DCG421202KWH
Product Title
DCG Series 4 in. White Gimbal LED Recessed Downlight, 2700K
UPC
767706146141

The DCG4 LED Gimbal Downlight is an economical, easy-to-install retrofit that’s perfect for upgrading to LED lighting from incandescent of fluorescent lighting. The easy twist-and-tilt directional lighting system allows for 360° rotation and 35° tilt to highlight artwork or architectural design features in your home. The DCG4 provides an energy efficient solution, designed to create an attractive visual aesthetic that's incredibly easy to install. The DCG4 is Dimmable (down to 5%) and features a 93 CRI rating, with an R9 value of 59, making it a contender among the highest quality light fixtures on the market. The DCG4 features spring-loaded retention tabs for a secure fit into any 4-inch recessed housing. Installs using an Edison base adapter or quick-connect (orange) cable, both of which are included. Choose from 2700K, 3000K, 4000K, or 5000K Color Temperatures. The DCG4 is Energy Star rated, Title 24 compliant, Damp-Location rated, and protected by NICOR's 5-Year Limited Warranty.

entry.title: 6 in. Square Nickel Flat Panel LED Downlight in 3000K
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nicor
Type: LED Lighting Fixtures
Price: 37.99

 6 in. Square Nickel Flat Panel LED Downlight in 3000K

Features
  • Includes LED Downlight Module, Off-Board Driver, and Nickel Faceplate
  • Includes 6.25-inch cut-out template
  • Installs directly into the ceiling. No housing or junction box needed.
  • 3000K Color Temperature
  • 879 Lumens

ATTRIBUTES
Model Number
DLE621203KSQNK
Product Title
DLE6 Series 6 in. Square Nickel Flat Panel LED Downlight in 3000K
UPC
767706164497



The DLE6 Edge Lit 6-inch Square LED Downlight creates an attractive visual aesthetic with a low profile that's incredibly easy to install. The edge-lit technology uses a reflective light guide panel that disperses light through a diffused lens, making it a practical, economical, and energy efficient solution for lighting your home or office. This high-performance downlight features 92 CRI, with an R9 value exceeding 50, making the DLE6 among the highest rated LED light fixtures in terms of light output quality. Installation no longer requires a recessed housing, but rather a simple 6.25" diameter cut-out in the ceiling using the provided template. The ultra-thin fixture depth (less than 1-inch) and off-board driver (included) allows for a more flexible installation and increased lifespan with superior heat management. The DLE6 features adjustable spring-loaded retention tabs for a secure fit, eliminating the need for a J-box or recessed housing. Adding light in tight spaces such as living rooms, hallways, bathrooms, basements, entryways, porches, and utility closets just got easier. The DLE6 is Energy Star rated, Insulation Contact rated (IC-rated), Airtight, Damp-location rated, and protected by NICOR's 5-Year Limited Warranty. The DLE6 comes ready to install and use right out of the box, no other components are required.

entry.summary:

Price: 56.99

5/6 in. Adjustable LED Eyeball Retrofit Downlight Kit in 2700K

Features
  • Fully adjustable rotation and 30° tilt.
  • Compatible with most standard 5 and 6 in. recessed housings
  • Dimmable to 10% with standard LED dimmers
  • 90W Equivalent. Uses only 12.47 Watts

ATTRIBUTES
Model Number
DEB56-20-120-2K-WH
Product Title
DEB56 Series 5/6 in. Adjustable LED Eyeball Retrofit Downlight Kit in 2700K
UPC
767706088694
Part of NICOR’s D-Series, the DEB56 is the perfect LED downlight solution for wall lighting and highlighting specific design features in your home. With a 360°/30° range of motion, the DEB56 provides the flexibility for those applications where a standard recessed downlight doesn’t quite fit. The DEB56 gives you the ability to aim light exactly where it’s needed allowing for more accent and display lighting applications. From LED color rendering and trim finishes to fixture performance, the design style is consistent with other luminaires in this design series.

The ultra-thin fixture depth (less than 1-inch) and off-board driver (included) allows for a more flexible installation and increased lifespan with superior heat management. The DLE4 features adjustable spring-loaded retention tabs for a secure fit, eliminating the need for a J-box or recessed housing. Adding light in tight spaces such as living rooms, hallways, bathrooms, basements, entryways, porches, and utility closets just got easier. The DLE4 is Title 24 Compliant (except 5000K version), Energy Star rated, Insulation Contact rated (IC-rated), Airtight, Damp-location rated, and protected by NICOR's 5-Year Limited Warranty. The DLE4 comes ready to install and use right out of the box, no other components are required.

The DGD4 LED Downlight Gimbal features the latest in performance LED Downlight technology, designed to create an attractive visual aesthetic that's incredibly easy to install. The high-performance DGD4 is Dimmable and features a 92 CRI rating, with an R9 value exceeding 50, making it one of the highest quality light fixtures on the market. Installation does NOT require a recessed housing or junction box, only a simple 4.125" diameter cut-out in the ceiling using the provided template. The elegantly designed fixture and off-board driver (included) allows for a more flexible installation and an increased lifespan thanks to the superior heat management system separated from the LED module itself. The DGD4 features adjustable spring-loaded retention tabs for a secure fit, eliminating the need for a recessed housing or junction box. Adding an adjustable, multi-directional light system to highlight artwork or architectural design features in your home just got easier. Freedom from having to use a housing or junction box allows this light to be installed in places others simply cannot. Available in Black, Nickel, Oil-Rubbed Bronze, and White. Choose from 2700K, 3000K, 4000K, or 5000K Color Temperatures. The DGD4 is Energy Star rated, Insulation Contact rated (IC-rated), Title 24 Compliant, Damp-Location rated, and protected by NICOR's 5-Year Limited Warranty.

entry.title: 4-inch White Square Multi-Adjustable Recessed LED Downlight, 5000K
entry.summary:
Vendor: Green Lighting Wholesale
Type: LED Recessed Retrofit Kits
Price: 36.99

4-inch White Square Multi-Adjustable Recessed LED Downlight, 5000K

Features
  • Includes LED Downlight (DQR4MA) with quick connect and Edison base adapter
  • Dimmable down to 5% using standard LED Dimmers
  • 5000K Color Temperature
  • 721 Lumens
  • 8.9 Watts

ATTRIBUTES
Model Number
DQR4MA11205KWH
Product Title
4-inch White Square Multi-Adjustable Recessed LED Downlight, 5000K
UPC
767706147469
The DQR4MA by NICOR is a 4-inch Square Multi-Adjustable LED Downlight. The modern and attractive visual aesthetic is incredibly easy to install and perfect for retrofitting both residential and commercial areas. The low profile DQR4MA includes a quick connect and Edison socket adapter for use in both new construction and remodel applications, including sloped and shallow recessed housings. The polystyrene diffuser lens creates uniform light distribution while reducing glare making it a practical, economical, and energy efficient solution for lighting your home or office. This DQR4MA is fully dimmable and can be rotated 360° and tilted down to 30° making it a very flexible option for directing light where it needs to be. This high-performance downlight features a CRI rating of 92, with an R9 value of 63, making the DQR4MA among the highest rated LED light fixtures in terms of light output quality. The DQR4MA features multiple retention tabs for a secure fit within 4-inch recessed housings. Adding light in tight spaces such as living rooms, kitchens, hallways, and entryways just got easier. The DQR4MA is Energy Star rated, Title 24 and CEC compliant, Damp-location rated, and protected by NICOR's 5-Year Limited Warranty. Comes ready to install and use right out of the box. Recessed Housing is required.

The DQR6 from NICOR is a 6-inch Square LED Recessed Downlight that is ideal for both retrofit and new construction alike. Everything you love about the DLR Series is now available with the aesthetics of a square trim. No special housing required, fits securely into any standard 6-inch recessed housings. The DQR6 features an integrated, energy efficient LED driver to produce over 1200 lumens of light while drawing only 16-Watts of energy! The enriched 90+ CRI provides top quality light output to provide superior color quality in your home. Guaranteed to make the colors in your home brighter and truer. The DQR6 is fully dimmable and constructed using the highest quality materials. The DQR6 is protected by NICOR's 5 Year Limited Warranty, UL Classified, Title 24 compliant, and Energy Star rated to bring you the finest recessed downlight on the market with the coverage and affordability you expect.
